name: molgenis-cosas
description: The `molgenis-cosas` repository contains all of the code and scripts used to create and maintain the samples database.

scripts.cosas: npm run build-cosas && npm run import-cosas
scripts.cosasrefs: npm run build-cosasrefs && npm run import-cosasrefs
scripts.cosasportal: npm run build-cosasportal && npm run import-cosasportal
scripts.build: npm run build-cosas && npm run build-cosasrefs && npm run build-cosasportal
scripts.import: npm run import-cosas && npm run import-cosasrefs && npm run import-cosasportal
